resources.string: To Picontest, the app designed for photo enthusiasts with a competitive spirit.
During the week, everyone takes their best photos from the app.
Once per week, you’ll receive a notification to choose one of your photos previously taken.
When you’ll select one picture, you’ll have to rate 10 random photos of other users.
Then you’ll see the final ranking in the app and enjoy to see the top-rated photos.
